title: paramapavana raama
sahitya:
parama pAvana rAmA pApa vimOcanA pArajUci nannu pAlimpumayya 



anupallavi



varamaruT-pAlanuta vArija lOcana vAraNArthi haraNa vAncita

phalapradA 



caraNam



kanakAmbaradhara karuNAnvitavara kAmajanaka narakAntaka murahara

vanajAsana sananuta vAridi kanyApriya vAmanarUpa shrInivAsa varanAyaka
